title: Ep 94: Joyful Music with 'PLL' Author Sara Shepard
itunes:title: Ep 94: Joyful Music with 'PLL' Author Sara Shepard
itunes:subtitle: ‘Pretty Little Liars’ author Sara Shepard is here to talk about her newest book (‘Safe In My Arms’), what it was like to watch Pretty Little Liars on TV, and the $35 instrument her whole family is obsessed with!Mentioned on the show: - Safe In My A...
description:
‘Pretty Little Liars’ author Sara Shepard is here to talk about her newest book (‘Safe In My Arms’), what it was like to watch Pretty Little Liars on TV, and the $35 instrument her whole family is obsessed with!


Mentioned on the show:

  • Safe In My Arms by Sara Shepard: https://bookshop.org/a/9875/9781524746780 
  • The Otomotone: https://amzn.to/3isCef5

As always, reach me at Caroline@geethanksjustboughtit.com, @geethanksjustboughtitpod on Instagram, or leave me a message at 424-245-0736.
